c74object.name: abc.mc.addsynth~
c74object.description: abc.mc.addsynth~ provides additive synthesis by adding n elementary sinusoidal generators. Each module includes two oscillators that are initialized at the same frequency but can be finely tuned. Each module has a separate output.

objarg.name: instances
objarg.description: sets the number of modules of additive synthesis [init=1:min=1:max=16]

attribute.name: f0
attribute.description: sets the general fundamental frequency in Hz [init=220:min=0.01:max=15000:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the general fundamental frequency in Hz

attribute.name: gain
attribute.description: sets the general volume in dB [init=0:min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].

attribute.name: amp[index]
attribute.description: sets the amplitude of the [index] module in dB, [index] is a 2 digits integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "06" for example. [init=dB(1/[index]):min=-127:max=18:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: sets the amplitude of the [index] module

attribute.name: fmult[index]
attribute.description: sets the multiplier of the fundamental f0 to tune the [index] module, [index] is a 2 digits integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "06" for example. [init=[index]:min=0:max=1000:step=0.00001].
attribute.digest: sets the multiplier of the fundamental f0 to tune the [index] module

attribute.name: fbeat[index]
attribute.description: set the frequency shift of the second oscillator of the [index] module in Hz, [index] is a 2 digits integer, if value inferior to 10 index should be written "06" for example. [init=0:min=0:max=20:step=0.01].
attribute.digest: set the frequency shift of the second oscillator of the [index] module in Hz
